snippet: Driving in Syria reveals the sometimes surreal experience of Syrians’ trying to move themselves and their goods around a country that has become a patchwork of rebellion and control.
abstract: Damascus Highway Journal; driving in Syria, particularly along strategic inland road from Damascus to Homs, reveals complicated patchwork of rebellion and control, in which government and rebel fighters share roads with families and traders trying to go about daily business.
lead_paragraph: Driving in Syria reveals the sometimes surreal experience of Syrians’ trying to move themselves and their goods around a country that has become a patchwork of rebellion and control.

headline.print_headline: Motorists Press On, Yielding for War
headline.main: In Syria, Motorists Press on, Yielding for War
